page.title: 07TOURISTS: FOREIGN STUDENTS
page.content: {Many families}within our block{take {in foreign students during the summer months who come here to improve their English. Most families receive them from {France and Germany}but some come from as far away as{Japan.}The usual number per family is one or two, but some take five at a time. The amount of money per student varies between{Â£30 {and Â£40 per week. Most families considered it was worthwhile having them. They liked the {extra money,}which was mainly used for {holidays and home improvements.}They also welcomed the chance to learn about another country and perhaps build up contacts there. Very few families had problems, but the responsibilitiy was a worry, and language was another problem. The majority would continue to have them.
